title: Macworld Podcast: The 25-year legacy of Mac OS X
content:
Macworld

When Apple officially announced Mac OS X, it changed the course of history for the company. On this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we’ll look at the history of Mac OS X, the effect it has had on the company, and what we expect in the future.

This is episode 916 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola. 

Watch episode 916 on YouTube

Listen to episode 916 on Apple Podcasts

Listen to episode 916 on Spotify

Get info 

For more information about the topics discussed on the show, click on the links below. 

  • Looking back 25 years later, even Steve was wrong about Mac OS X 
  • From Aqua to Catalina: The evolution of macOS X
